Avg Blob Capacity for pagopapweureceiptsfnsa
Blob storage - Comparison between ingress (uploads/writes) and egress (downloads/reads)

content.content:
Info: Ingress vs Egress on Blob Storage

Ingress represents the volume of data uploaded to the Blob Storage. Egress represents the volume of data downloaded from the Blob Storage. How to interpret them together:
  • Ingress > Egress: data ingestion phase
  • Egress > Ingress: data consumption phase (download/ distribution)

chart.title: Avg Availability for pagopapweureceiptsfnsa
Queue Storage - Availability on time
Avg Queue Capacity for pagopapweureceiptsfnsa
Queue Storage - Used capacity by queues
Avg Queue Message Count for pagopapweureceiptsfnsa
Queue Storage - Number of unexpired messages in storage
Avg Blob Capacity for pagopapweureceiptsfnsa
Queue storage - Comparison between ingress (uploads/writes) and egress (downloads/reads)

content.content:
Info: Ingress vs Egress on Queue Storage

Ingress represents the volume of messages placed in the queue (enqueue). Egress represents the volume of messages read or removed from the queue (dequeue). How to interpret them together:
  • Ingress Egress: balanced system
  • Ingress > Egress: growing backlog (consumers slower than load)
  • Egress > Ingress: emptying of the queue

chart.title: Sum Transactions for pagopapweureceiptsfnsa by Response type
Queue storage - Operations on messages

content.content:
Info: Operations on Queue Storage

_PutMessage_ defines that the message was enqueued by producer, so indicate an incoming load. _GetMessagesRead_ defines that the messages are dequeued from the queue, so became invisible but does not imply success. _DeleteMessage_ defines that the message is confirmed by an ack and removed. How to interpret them together:
  • Put GetRead Delete: healthy system
  • Put > GetRead: slow consumer
  • GetRead > Delete: errors or retries
  • Delete < GetRead: messages processed but not completed

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
exceptions
| where cloud_RoleName has "pagopareceiptpdfdatastore"
| where outerMessage contains "Exception while executing function: Functions"
//| summarize Number_of_messages = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d) 
| make-series Number_of_messages = count() default=0 on timestamp step 1d
| render timechart with (title="Datastore - Exception while executing function", xtitle="Number of event", ytitle="Time",legend=hidden)

content.Query:
exceptions
| where cloud_RoleName has "pagopareceiptpdfdatastore"
| where outerMessage contains "Exception while executing function: Functions"
| summarize Number_of_messages = count() by bin(timestamp, 1h) 
//| make-series count() default=0 on timestamp from ago(7d) step 1d
| render timechart with (title="Datastore - Exception while executing function", ytitle="Number of event", xtitle="Time",legend=hidden)

inputs.name: Query

| where cloud_RoleName has "pagopareceiptpdfdatastore"

| make-series Number_of_messages = count() default=0 on timestamp step 1d
| render timechart with (title="Datastore - Exception while executing function", xtitle="Number of event", ytitle="Time",legend=hidden)

content.Query:
traces
| where cloud_RoleName has "pagopareceiptpdfdatastore"
| where message contains "Error sending message to queue"
| summarize Number_of_messages = count() by bin(timestamp, 1h) 
//| make-series count() default=0 on timestamp step 1d
| render columnchart with (title="Datastore - Exception while executing function", ytitle="Number of event", xtitle="Time",legend=hidden)
content.PartTitle: Datastore - Error sending message to queue

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where cloud_RoleName has "pagopareceiptpdfgenerator"
| where message contains "Error mapping bizEvent data to template, missing property"
| summarize Number_of_messages = count() by bin(timestamp, 1h) 
//| make-series count() default=0 on timestamp step 1d
| render timechart with (title="Generator - Receipt PDF can not be generated because of missing property in Biz-Event", ytitle="Number of event", xtitle="Time",legend=hidden)

inputs.name: PartTitle
inputs.value: Generator - Receipt PDF can not be generated because of missing property in Biz-Event

content.PartTitle: Generator - Receipt PDF not generated for missing property in BizEvent

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
traces
| where cloud_RoleName has "pagopareceiptpdfgenerator"
| where message contains "Error mapping bizEvent data to template, missing property"
| extend errore = parse_json(tostring(customDimensions["prop__{OriginalFormat}"]))
| extend error_detail = tostring(extract("missing property(.*)",1,tostring(errore.message)))
//| where error_detail contains "transaction.psp.name"
//| where error_detail contains "cart.item.subject"
//| summarize Number_of_messages = count() by error_detail
| summarize Number_of_messages = count() by error_detail, bin(timestamp, 15m) 
//| make-series count() default=0 on timestamp step 1d
| render timechart
    with (
    title="Generator - Receipt PDF can not be generated because of missing property in Biz-Event",
    ytitle="Number of event",
    xtitle="Time",
    legend=hidden)

inputs.name: PartTitle
inputs.value: Generator - Receipt PDF can not be generated because of missing property in Biz-Event

content.PartTitle: Generator - Receipt PDF not generated for missing property in BizEvent (detail)
